1.name: Psycho
1.description: A Phoenix secretary embezzles forty thousand dollars from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

2.name: The Two Faces of Dr. Jekyll
2.description: Dr. Henry Jekyll experiments with scientific means of revealing the hidden, dark side of man and releases a murderer from within himself.

3.name: The Magnificent Seven
3.description: Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.

4.name: Spartacus
4.description: The slave Spartacus leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman Republic.

5.name: The Apartment
5.description: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

6.name: Ocean's Eleven
6.description: Danny Ocean gathers a group of his World War II compatriots to pull off the ultimate Las Vegas heist. Together the eleven friends plan to rob five Las Vegas casinos in one night.

7.name: The Alamo
7.description: In 1836, a small band of soldiers sacrifice their lives in hopeless combat against a massive army in order to prevent a tyrant from smashing the new Republic of Texas.

8.name: La dolce vita
8.description: A series of stories following a week in the life of a philandering paparazzo journalist living in Rome.

9.name: À bout de souffle
9.description: A small-time thief steals a car and impulsively murders a motorcycle policeman. Wanted by the authorities, he reunites with a hip American journalism student and attempts to persuade her to run away with him to Italy.

10.name: The Time Machine
10.description: A man's vision for a utopian society is disillusioned when travelling forward into time reveals a dark and dangerous society.

11.name: Hell to Eternity
11.description: When his adoptive Japanese-American family is sent to Manzanar after Pearl Harbor, a young Chicano enlists in the marines to become a hero in the Battle of Saipan.

12.name: Les yeux sans visage
12.description: A surgeon causes an accident which leaves his daughter disfigured, and goes to extremes to give her a new face.

13.name: Swiss Family Robinson
13.description: A Swiss family must survive being shipwrecked on a deserted island.

14.name: Plein soleil
14.description: Tom Ripley is a talented mimic, moocher, forger and all-around criminal improviser; but there's more to Tom Ripley than even he can guess.

15.name: Exodus
15.description: The state of Israel is created in 1948, resulting in war with its Arab neighbors.

16.name: The Little Shop of Horrors
16.description: A clumsy young man nurtures a plant and discovers that it's carnivorous, forcing him to kill to feed it.

17.name: Home from the Hill
17.description: Dramatic story of the influential Hunnicutt family set in Texas during the late 1950s.

18.name: La maschera del demonio
18.description: A vengeful witch and her fiendish servant return from the grave and begin a bloody campaign to possess the body of the witch's beautiful look-alike descendant, with only the girl's brother and a handsome doctor standing in her way.

19.name: Peeping Tom
19.description: A young man murders women, using a movie camera to film their dying expressions of terror.

20.name: Pollyanna
20.description: A young girl comes to an embittered town and confronts its attitude with her determination to see the best in life.

21.name: The Unforgiven
21.description: The neighbors of a frontier family turn on them when it is suspected that their adopted daughter was stolen from the local Kiowa tribe.

22.name: The Gallant Hours
22.description: A semi-documentary dramatization of five weeks in the life of Vice Admiral William F. "Bull" Halsey, Jr., from his assignment to command the U.S. naval operations in the South Pacific to the Allied victory at Guadalcanal.

23.name: L'Avventura
23.description: A woman disappears during a Mediterranean boating trip. During the search, her lover and her best friend become attracted to each other.

24.name: Where the Boys Are
24.description: Four very different college girls drive to Fort Lauderdale, Florida for spring break and seek out various adventures and romance for themselves.

25.name: La ciociara
25.description: In the Italy of WWII, a widow and her lonely daughter seek for distance between them and the horrors of war.

26.name: High Time
26.description: Widower and hamburger restaurateur Harvey Howard decides to go to college at 51 years of age. Resisting the easy path, he insists on not receiving preferential treatment, and lives in a ...                See full summary »

27.name: Tunes of Glory
27.description: After World War II, a Highland Regiment's acting Commanding Officer, who rose from the ranks, is replaced by a peace-time Oxford-educated Commanding Officer, leading to a dramatic conflict between the two.

28.name: Inherit the Wind
28.description: Based on a real-life case in 1925, two great lawyers argue the case for and against a science teacher accused of the crime of teaching evolution.

29.name: The Bulldog Breed
29.description: When he is crossed in love, grocers assistant Norman Puckle joins the Navy, where he is recruited to man the first British rocket.

30.name: La vérité
30.description: A liberated small-town girl and the family's black sheep moves to Paris with her sister, only to find herself standing trial for the shocking murder of her young lover. Was his killing premeditated or was this a crime of passion?

31.name: Rocco e i suoi fratelli
31.description: Having recently been uprooted to Milan, Rocco and his four brothers each look for a new way in life when a prostitute comes between Rocco and his brother Simone.

32.name: Village of the Damned
32.description: In the English village of Midwich, the blonde-haired, glowing-eyed children of uncertain paternity prove to have frightening powers.

33.name: Elmer Gantry
33.description: A fast-talking traveling salesman with a charming, loquacious manner convinces a sincere evangelist that he can be an effective preacher for her cause.

34.name: North to Alaska
34.description: During the Alaska gold rush, prospector George sends partner Sam to Seattle to bring his fiancée but when it turns out that she married another man, Sam returns with a pretty substitute, the hostess of the Henhouse dance hall.

35.name: Jungfrukällan
35.description: An innocent yet pampered young virgin and her family's pregnant and jealous servant set out to deliver candles to church, but only one returns from events that transpire in the woods along the way.

36.name: Hell Bent for Leather
36.description: Mistaken for a murderous outlaw, an innocent passerby is forced to go on the run to try and clear his name by catching the real culprit.

37.name: Strangers When We Meet
37.description: A suburban architect loves his wife but is bored with his marriage and with his work, so he takes up with the neglected, married beauty who lives down the street.

38.name: Let's Make Love
38.description: When billionaire Jean-Marc Clement learns that he is to be satirized in an off-Broadway revue, he passes himself off as an actor playing him in order to get closer to the beautiful star of the show, Amanda Dell.

39.name: Babes in Toyland
39.description: Tom the Piper's Son is about to marry Mary Quite Contrary. On the eve of their wedding, evil miser Barnaby hires two henchmen to drown Tom and steal Mary's sheep, cared for by Little Bo ...                See full summary »

40.name: 13 Ghosts
40.description: A family inherits what proves to be a haunted house, but a special pair of goggles allows them to see their ghostly tormentors.

41.name: BUtterfield 8
41.description: A Manhattan call girl has a tragic affair with a rich married man.

42.name: Midnight Lace
42.description: In London, a recently wed American woman's sanity comes into question when she claims to be the victim of a threatening stalker.

43.name: The League of Gentlemen
43.description: A disgruntled veteran recruits a group of disgraced colleagues to perform a bank robbery with military precision.

44.name: Please Don't Eat the Daisies
44.description: A university professor leaves his job to become a theater critic, creating problems with his family and friends.

45.name: G.I. Blues
45.description: Tulsa, a soldier with dreams of running his own nightclub, places a bet with his friend Dynamite that he can win the heart of an untouchable dancer...but when Dynamite is transferred, Tulsa must replace him in the bet.

46.name: The Brides of Dracula
46.description: Vampire hunter Van Helsing returns to Transylvania to destroy handsome bloodsucker Baron Meinster, who has designs on beautiful young schoolteacher Marianne.

47.name: School for Scoundrels
47.description: Based on the Stephen Potter "One Upmanship" and "Lifemanship" books, Henry Palfrey tries hard to impress but always loses out to the rotter Delauney. Then he discovers the Lifeman college ...                See full summary »

48.name: House of Usher
48.description: Upon entering his fiancée's family mansion, a man discovers a savage family curse and fears that his future brother-in-law has entombed his bride-to-be prematurely.

49.name: The City of the Dead
49.description: A young college student arrives in a sleepy Massachusetts town to research witchcraft; during her stay at an eerie inn, she discovers a startling secret about the town and its inhabitants.

50.name: Le trou
50.description: In prison four long-sentence inmates planning an elaborate escape cautiously induct a new inmate to join in their scheme which leads to distrust and uncertainty.
